name: Magic Defenders
description:
In this game you play as a wizard, who has lost his deck of magic and you have to venture out and find his magical cards scattered across the world! You will then use those cards against the evil red wizard in a test of skill and patience, good luck!

To fit the theme of the jam I mixed two genres, platforming and strategy card game, I wanted to do something that was every contrasting but that still linked together somehow and I thought of the card idea and it seemed perfect.

Enjoy!

Note: If you get stuck, collect all 3 cards and then go to the door at the bottom right to move on to the next section of the game.
